member.name: T:TB.ComponentModel.UniversalTypeConverter
member.summary: Converts a data type to another data type.
member.remarks:
DBNull.Value is treated as null.
Supports the following conversions:
- conversion from a base type to another base type
- base type conversion includes the typical conversions from/to an enum - supporting flags
- base type conversion includes string conversion from/to a Guid
- base type conversion includes enhanced conversions for special values, e.g. "yes" to true, 'n' to false, true to 'T', etc.
- conversion from a base type to the nullable (?) pendant
- conversion from a nullable (?) base type to the not nullable pendant
- conversion supported by the TypeConverters of the given types
- conversion supported by the implementation of IConvertible of the given types
- optional conversion from null to value types using the default value
- optional conversion from whitespace to value types using the default value
Converting whole lists of values is supported through IEnumerable and IEnumerable(T).

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.UniversalTypeConverter.DefaultNullStringValue
member.summary: Defines ".null." as the default null value which is used on string conversions.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.UniversalTypeConverter.DefaultStringSeperator
member.summary: Defines the semicolon (;) as the default seperator which is used on enumerable conversions.

member.name: M:TB.ComponentModel.UniversalTypeConverter.ValueRepresentsNull(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks whether the given value represents null. The DBNull.Value is treated as null. This comes handy if conversion is applied to values coming from or sending to a database via ADO.Net.

member.name: M:TB.ComponentModel.UniversalTypeConverter.GetDefaultValueOfType(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the default value of the given type. ValueTypes always have a parameterless constructor. The default value of other types is always null.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.UniversalTypeConverter.DefaultCulture
member.summary: Defines the default culture which is used during conversion. Same as CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.

member.typeparam: The Type to test.
member.param: The value to test.
member.returns: true if can be converted to ; otherwise, false.

member.returns: List of converted values.

member.returns: List of converted values.

member.name: T:TB.ComponentModel.InvalidConversionException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a conversion is invalid.

member.name: M:TB.ComponentModel.InvalidConversionException.#ctor(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the InvalidConversionException class.

member.name: T:TB.ComponentModel.ConversionOptions
member.summary: Defines options for a conversion.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.ConversionOptions.None
member.summary: No options are used.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.ConversionOptions.EnhancedTypicalValues
member.summary: Includes some typical conversions, e.g. "yes" to true, 'n' to false, true to 'T', etc. This option is used by default.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.ConversionOptions.AllowDefaultValueIfNull
member.summary: Returns the default value of the given type of destination if the given value is null and the type of destination doesn't support null.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.ConversionOptions.AllowDefaultValueIfWhitespace
member.summary: Returns the default value of the given type of destination if the given value is a string containing only whitespace but no conversion from whitespace is supported.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.ConversionOptions.Default
member.summary: The default value for conversions. Same as EnhancedTypicalValues.

member.name: T:TB.ComponentModel.IStringSplitter
member.summary: Defines a splitter for converting a string represenation of a list of values.

member.name: M:TB.ComponentModel.IStringSplitter.Split(System.String)
member.summary: Splits the given string represenation of a list of values.
member.param: String represenation of the list to split.
member.returns: A list of the splitted values.

member.name: T:TB.ComponentModel.GenericStringSplitter
member.summary: Defines a 'split by seperator process' for converting a string represenation of a list of values.

member.name: M:TB.ComponentModel.GenericStringSplitter.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the GenericStringSplitter class using the semicolon as seperator.

member.name: M:TB.ComponentModel.GenericStringSplitter.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the GenericStringSplitter class.
member.param: The seperator to use for splitting.

member.name: M:TB.ComponentModel.GenericStringSplitter.Split(System.String)
member.summary: Splits the given string represenation of a list of values.
member.param: String represenation of the list to split.
member.returns: A list of the splitted values.

member.name: T:TB.ComponentModel.ConcatenationOptions
member.summary: Defines Options for a string concatenation.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.ConcatenationOptions.None
member.summary: No options are used.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.ConcatenationOptions.IgnoreNull
member.summary: Null values are ignored on concatenation.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.ConcatenationOptions.IgnoreEmpty
member.summary: Empty values are ignored on concatenation.

member.name: F:TB.ComponentModel.ConcatenationOptions.Default
member.summary: The default value for concatenations. Same as ConcatenationOptions.None.
